docs.snippet: Facebook Inc Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg, who has been mentioned as a potential Treasury Secretary should Democrat Hillary Clinton become the next U.S. president, said on Tuesday she has no plans to go into government.

headline.print_headline: Facebook's Sandberg Says Has No Plan to Work in Government
headline.main: Facebook's Sandberg Says Has No Plan to Work in Government

docs.snippet: The administration will overhaul its response to online propaganda from the Islamic State after acknowledging it had largely failed to counter extremists on social media.

headline.print_headline: Obama Shifting Online Strategy on ISIS
headline.main: Obama Shifts Online Strategy on ISIS

docs.abstract: Obama administration announces it is overhauling efforts to counter online propaganda of Islamic State, and underscores necessity of receiving help from some of nation's largest technology companies to more effectively combat recruitment and exhortations to violence appearing on social media.
